summary: This document is a series of FBI emails from December 2021 discussing the location and status of Jeffrey Epstein's former yacht, 'The Dancing Hare' (previously named after Ghislaine Maxwell), which was docked in Palau. FBI agents from the New York Field Office, Los Angeles, and Canberra Legat coordinate to determine if there is any investigative interest or seizure order for the vessel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the person the yacht was originally named after before its name was changed to 'The Dancing Hare'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and convicted sex offender
persons.context: Identified as the former owner of the yacht 'The Dancing Hare', which is the subject of the FBI email inquiry.

connections.description: Epstein's yacht was previously named after Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating a close personal or financial association.

events.title: Yacht arrival in Palau
events.description: The yacht 'The Dancing Hare' reportedly arrived in a Palau port.

events.title: Possible yacht arrival in Noumea
events.description: Tracking data suggests the yacht may have arrived in Noumea around mid-August 2021.

events.title: Yacht docked in New Zealand
events.description: The yacht spent significant time docked in various ports throughout New Zealand since at least the beginning of 2020.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's former yacht, renamed 'The Dancing Hare', was located in Palau in December 2021, prompting FBI internal inquiries.
The yacht was previously named after Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating her significant association with Epstein's assets.
FBI agents from New York, Los Angeles, and Canberra coordinated to check for any active investigative interest or seizure orders related to the vessel.
The yacht had spent considerable time docked in New Zealand ports since at least 2020 and was tracked by conspiracy theorists due to its Epstein/Maxwell connections.
The current ownership of the yacht was described as 'murky', suggesting ongoing complexity in the disposition of Epstein's assets after his death.
